chunk: Beanie dip with breadsticks recipe A tasty dip made with butter beans and breadsticks on the side. Age: 6 months or older Prep: 10 mins Cook: None Portions: 8 (approx) Ingredients - 2 garlic cloves, peeled - 2 to 3 sprigs fresh mint - 1 tin (400g) butter beans, no added salt or sugar, drained - 1 tbsp olive oil - 1 plain breadstick (snapped into finger lengths), to serve Method Crush the garlic and roughly chop the mint. Warm the butter beans in a pan with the olive oil. Add the crushed garlic and mint to the beans. Simmer for 5 to 10 minutes until the beans are tender â€“ add a little water if needed. Blend until smooth. Serve 1 portion in a bowl with breadsticks on the side. Store the rest in an airtight container in the fridge. Information: If you prefer, swap the breadsticks for soft

chunk: Serve 1 portion in a bowl with breadsticks on the side. Store the rest in an airtight container in the fridge. Information: If you prefer, swap the breadsticks for soft cooked carrot sticks.
